name: Target: Bad Pigeon-Fancier Challenge
description:
In Target: BP-FC Player must save world from bad pigeon-fancier who built his own mechanical pigeons and wants use them to conquer the world. Stop him and save world!.

Target: BP-FC is small part of other game called "Target" (something like Hitman:Sniper Challenge) .It is first polish FPS with RPG elements for pc from 1998. Original plot take place in poland after ZSRR fall. Player is a mafia mercenary. In remake i want go further than that.

See Gameplay here

Multiplayer was develop in 2014 and never finish. It was next step in the road to make remake/restart of classic Target game, and it was never finish. Game is split screen multiplayer but also can mimics normal multiplayer using simple trick. Normaly it runs in window mode and allow resize window, normal game is 1280x600 and and looks like normal split screen but if you have two screens you can stretch windows horizontaly and have "normal" multiplayer. Because this is second and last build z 2014:
- it use Unity 4
- allows only gamepads for player 1&2
- no score
- no random spawnpoints!
- HUD is not finished
- It have only one map.
